oai_dc:dc.dc:title: French. William C. Houston letter, Jan. 5, 1915 02
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from William C. Houston, U.S. House of Representatives, Committee on the Territories, Washington, D.C., to Mrs. Crozier French, Knoxville, Tenn. January 5, 1915. Page 1 of 2. Re: his position on suffrage.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Correspondence; Politicians; Women's suffrage;
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: W.C. Houston
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: C.M. McClung Historical Collection, Knox County Public Library
